metadata.name: Suspicious PowerShell Parent Process
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious or uncommon parent processes of PowerShell

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('tomcat')) AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\amigo.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\browser.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\chrome.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\firefox.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\httpd.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\iexplore.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\jbosssvc.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\microsoftedge.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\microsoftedgecp.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\microsoftedgesh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\mshta.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\nginx.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\outlook.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\php-cgi.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\regsvr32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\safari.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\services.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\sqlagent.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\sqlserver.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\sqlservr.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\vivaldi.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\w3wp.exe'))) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/c powershell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/c pwsh'))) AND lower(device.desc) = lower('windows powershell') AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('powershell core 6') AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\.exe', 'pwsh\.dll')))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious or uncommon parent processes of PowerShell
